4859.quoteText:
to measure reach and effectiveness of advertisement campaigns, to offer targeted advertising, to personalize experience by showing advertisements for products and services that are more likely to appeal to you (i.e.
behavioral advertising).

4860.quoteText: information we collect about you from third party companies including but not limited to publishing partners, platforms, advertising platforms and partners, and data aggregators, which may include attributes about you and your interests, as well as other games and services you use, and demographic and general location information.

4862.quoteText:
Ad identifiers are non-permanent, non-personal identifiers such as the Android advertising ID and/or Apple's ID for advertising (the ‘IDFA’), which are uniquely associated with your device.
Similar technologies include tracking pixels within ads.

You must be 18 to accept these terms and buy the app

4868.quoteText:
If a court finds part of this contract illegal, the rest will continue in force

​

Each of the paragraphs of these terms operates separately. If any court or relevant authority decides that any of them are unlawful, the remaining paragraphs will remain in full force and effect.
4868.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
